short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the "People Also Asked" results from Google Search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Hide People Also Asked results is a lightweight extension for Chrome web browser that easily allows you to hide the People Also Asked box.

People Also Asked is a great resource for most people. But, for power users, developers, and digital marketing experts. The People Also Asked box can be an annoyance. This extension hides the results from the Google Search Results page.
